さて……この短期間でシリウスシュガーがどれだけ成長したか。\nお手並み拝見といこ:
Now...how much Sirius Sugaru has grown in such a short time.
Let's see what you can do.
言っとくけど、私は胸を貸すつもりなんてないわよ。\n前と同じように、正面から叩き:
Just so you know, I have no intention of lending you my breasts.
Just like last time, I'll crush you head-on!
ほ、本当に実機を使った模擬戦で良かったのかな……\n公式戦直前に、もし怪我でもさ:
I-Is it really okay for it to be a mock battle using real machines...?
If you get hurt right before the official match...
提案してきたのは向こうよ。それなりに自信があるんじゃない？: He's the one who suggested it. You're pretty confident, aren't you?
それと、模擬戦だからって気を抜かないでね。\n万一負けたらウチの評価に響くんだか:
Also, don't let your guard down just because it's a mock battle.
If we lose, it'll affect our reputation.
普段通りにやれば大丈夫。うるう、奇襲への備えは任せるわね。: We'll be fine as long as we do what we usually do. Ugh, I'll leave it to you to prepare for a surprise attack.
わ、わたしですか～？ うぅ、責任重大……: M-Me? Ugh, this is a huge responsibility...
無駄話はそこまでだ。シリウスシュガーの前衛が接近している。: That was the end of the idle chatter. The vanguard of Sirius Sugaru was approaching.
あれは……朽葉と鳴滝か。\n前回は教科書通りの動きだったが……今回はどうする？:
Those are... Kuchiba and Narutaki.
Last time, it was like a textbook... What should we do this time?
なっ！？ 真っ直ぐ突っ込んでくるんだけど！？: What?! It's charging straight at me!
正面から殴り合うつもりか？: Are you trying to hit me head-on?
ちょっとは操縦技術が上がったみたいだけど、それは無謀じゃない？: It looks like you've improved your piloting skills a little, but isn't that reckless?
前回の敗因は、接敵後すぐにラインを下げたせいで\n敵のペースに呑まれたことですわ:
The reason for my defeat last time was because I lowered the line immediately after contact
We've been caught up in the enemy's pace...
ならば、先にアクションを起こして流れを作ります！: In that case, I'll take action first to create a flow!
前の戦いで私たちがとった作戦への意趣返しか？\n戦場に感情を持ち込むのは悪手だぞ:
Is this payback for the strategy we took in the last battle?
Bringing emotions into the battlefield is a bad move.
もしかして、ボコボコにされたのを根に持ってる？\nなら、また同じ目に遭わせてあげ:
Could it be that she's holding a grudge over being beaten to a pulp?
In that case, I’ll make you go through the same thing again!
正面からの強行突破……鳴滝さんらしくない強引な作戦。\n恐らく狙いは別にあるはず:
Forcing her way through from the front... This isn't like Narutaki-san at all.
She was probably aiming for something else.
突っ込んできた２機は陽動……なら、残りの３機はどこから？: The two machines charging in were a diversion... So where did the other three come from?
考えられるのは、地形を隠れ蓑にした匍匐飛行による接近――: All I can think about is the approach using the terrain as cover――
……あっ！ き、来た！ 敵機が低空から接近してますぅ～～！！: ...Ah! Th-They're coming! The enemy's approaching from low altitude!
そう来ると思ったわ！舞亜さん、うるうさん！ 迎撃準備を！: I knew you'd say that! Maia, Shut up! Prepare to intercept!
状況的には高空をとってる私達が有利。なら……！: In terms of the situation, we have the advantage in high altitude. In that case...!
急降下から勢いそのままに近接格闘戦へ持ち込みます！\n舞亜さんは一条さんを、うる:
We're going to dive straight into close-quarters combat!
Maia-san, please aim for Ichijou-san and Uru-san for Tsukigase-san!
桃園さんは私があたります！: Momozono-san, I'll take care of you!
これで５機それぞれが１対１の状況か。\nこうなっては、純粋な実力が勝敗を決めるこ:
Now each of the five machines is in a one-on-one situation.
At this point, pure skill will decide the outcome.
あの子たち、正面から戦って私たちに勝てると思ってるの？\nどんな特訓したか知らな:
Do they really think they can beat us in a head-on fight?
I don't know what kind of training you did, but it's not that naive!
――もちろん、そんなことは承知の上ですわ。: —Of course, I am aware of that.
誰がタイマンするなんて言ったんだろうね～？\n何時何分何秒かな～？:
I wonder who said I'd give you a timer~?
How many minutes, how many seconds?
シリウスシュガーには悪いけど、勝たせてもらうから！: I’m sorry to Sirius Sugaru, but I’ll let you win!
大丈夫……あれだけ練習したんだもん……！\n今は、これだけに集中して……！:
It's okay... I practiced so much...!
Right now, I need to focus on this...!
今のはフラットスピン……！？\nいつの間にそんな技を！？:
Was that a flat spin...!?
When did you learn such a technique?!
なんて動き……！ ターゲットが定まらない！……っ！ マズイ！！: What a move...! I can't decide on a target! ...! This is bad!!
葵さん！ クララさん！ 桃園さんがそちらに！: Miss Aoi! Miss Clara! Miss Momozono is over there!
この状況は……一度下がって態勢を整え――: This situation... I’ll step back and get ready—
どこにいくつもりですの？\nあなたの相手はわたくしでしてよ！:
Where do you think you're going?
I'll be your opponent!
尻尾まいて逃げるつもり～？\nダメダメ、そんなの許すわけないじゃん。:
Are you going to run away with your tail between your legs?
No, no, there's no way I'd allow that.
すまない、私はここまでだ……: Sorry, this is as far as I can go...
――生駒機の撃破を確認。: ――Confirming the defeat of the Ikoma machine.
ちょっ、ヤバいって！\n葵がやられたら、私ひとりになるんだけど！？:
Hey, this is bad!
If Aoi gets killed, I'll be alone!
人数不利の状態で、開けた場所での空戦は不利ね……: We're at a disadvantage in terms of numbers, and air combat in an open area is disadvantageous...
一度下がって態勢を整えるわ！\n私が援護するから、クララさんは下がって！:
I'll step back and get ready!
I'll cover you, so get back, Clara!
舞亜さん、うるうさんも下がりつつクララさんを援護！\n匍匐飛行を行い、地形を利用:
Maia, Uru-san, stay back and support Clara!
We'll crawl and use the terrain!
あんなに大口叩いといて、このザマなんて……ぷぷぷっ！: I can't believe I'm acting like this after talking so big... Pfft!
……逃げるってことは、わたしたちが有利。: ...Running away means we have the advantage.
どうする、追撃する？\n罠の可能性もあるけど、今がチャンスじゃない？:
What should we do? Should we pursue them?
It's possible it's a trap, but isn't this our chance?
ああ。俺もそう思う。七彩、お前の判断は？: Yeah. I think so too. Shichika, what's your decision?
ええ、間違いなく好機ですわ！ 全員、匍匐飛行で追撃開始！\n特訓の成果をみせます:
Yes, this is definitely a good opportunity! Everyone, begin pursuit with a crawl!
I'll show you the results of my special training!
